content: your shawl increases a total of 16 sts bind off on rs with a stretchy bind-off of your choice we like after the last repeat you will have 221 sts on your needle 99 an icelandic bind-off for a tidy-yet-stretchy edge that blocks ribbed sts between markers on each side well weave in all ends shawl border block shawl to measurements set-up row rs k2 sm p1 k1 p1 to one st before m p1 m1r rm p1 k1 p1 to m rm m1l p1 k1 p1 to last m sm k2 2 sts increase d border row 1 ws k2 sm k1 p1 to one st before last m k1 sm k2 border row 2 rs k2 sm p1 k1 p1 to last m sm k2 repeat border row 1-2 two more times repeat border row 1 8 border row total visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlkcountryweekendshawl www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
